title: "As Linux Foundation's Zephyr Project Turns Five, Addressing Constrained Device Challenges is More Important Than Ever"
excerpt: "Noting nearly 1,000 contributors, 50,000 commits building advanced support for multiple architectures including ARC, Arm, Intel, Nios, RISC-V, SPARC and Tensilica, and more than 250 boards; the Zephyr Project is throwing a virtual party that will run from June 8 - 10 this year."
